Key: All right, we came to the shopping district, but...

(It's hard to decide where to go when you don't really
have a purpose. I guess we can buy some drinks
somewhere...)
Hey, Papa?
Hm? What is it, Rio?

There's someone staring over there. She has a lot of
odangos. She must eat a lot.

A person that's eating a lot looking this way?
...Oh, no!
Tohka?!

I knew it was you, Shido! I was wondering about it,
but you were with someone I didn't know, so I wasn't
sure if I should call out to you.
Ah I see. What a coincidence.
I know. Anyways, who is that girl, Shido?
Oh, she's...
...Eat. Is Rio going to be eaten?

...No, no. Tohka does eat a lot, but she won't eat
you, so don't worry.
...Really?
Really. There's no one that eats people.
Huh? Rio knows someone? Tokisa―

STOP! Please I don't want to be cursed, so don't
say any more!
Really? If you say so, Papa. Okay.
Thanks. So, um... she's Rio.
Rio. That's a nice name! It's similar to Rinne's name.
Yeah. Rinne is Rio's Ma―
Sh-She's Tonomachi's relative. I'm looking after her.
Tonomachi's? They don't look alike at all.

Well, that happens with relatives. Anyways, what were
you doing?

Oh. It smelled good today, so I dropped by the dango
store. See look. It's freshly made and it looks so
good!
Oh, it does look good.
(All right. I was able to dodge that one...)
Papa. Is she... Tohka Yatogami?
Yeah. So Rio, don't call me Papa in front of her...
Why? Papa is Papa, right?
There's a time and a place for things...
Shido... Why is Rio calling you Papa?
Oh... I guess she likes hanging out with me.

Well, you are very likeable. So you're playing dad for
now, huh? That must be nice, Shido.
Yeah, Papa is nice! He's super-duper nice.
Right. Rio you're right, Shido is very nice.
Tohka-chan, you eat a lot!
*Grunt*?!
But that's what makes you great.
Y-Yes...

Then do you want to go on a walk with us too,
Tohka-chan?

Yeah, that's a great idea. Once you're done with the
dango, do you want to take a stroll with us, Tohka?
Okay. Then I must eat it. Do you want to try one?
I can? Don't you like to eat a lot, Tohka-chan?
It's fine. I have one more. No need to be shy.

Okay. Thank you, Tohka-chan. *Nom*... *nom, nom*...
Yummy!
Right?! Isobeyaki is just one of my favorites.
Are there others?
Yeah. My very favorite is the one with kinako.
Oh, that sounds good.
Do you want to try it?
Yeah. Tohka-chan, you're nice. Just like Papa.
Hehe, right?! I don't eat a lot, I'm just nice!
If you don't say stuff like that.
*Grunt*...?!
Hehe... Ahaha...
What's so funny, Shido?
Nothing.

(I'm not going to tell her that it's hard to tell which
one of them is older.)
(Evening fell as we walked around with Tohka.)
Rio has to go soon.
Oh, is it time to see Marina?
Yeah. I promised her.
I see. Did you have fun?
Yes. I had a lot of fun.
Okay, good.
Well... Bye, Papa, Tohka-chan.
Okay, see you later Rio!
Bye, Rio.

(...Hey wait. I had something to ask Marina and I totally
forgot. Oh well, next time I see her―)
I forgot to tell you something, Papa.
Hm? What is it?
If you're going to visit today... Park, okay?
(Rio whispered into my ear.)
...Okay.
Bye-bye!
I couldn't hear... What did Rio say to you?
...Thanks for today. I guess she was shy.
(I couldn't tell her what Rio told me.)
Hehe, I see. Rio was very cute.
(I nodded with a smile.)
